channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: European trade ministers meet to forge strategy after Trump's surprise 30% tariffs

item.title: Stocks Shrug Off Trump’s Latest Tariff Threats
item.description: Analysts said the muted market response was because many investors expected the levies to settle at lower levels after negotiations.

item.title: Trump Reluctantly Comes Around to Backing Ukraine. Will He Stick With It?
item.description: President Trump is expected this week to formalize a new plan to sell American weapons to European allies, who would pass them onto Kyiv.

item.title: It’s No Bluff: The Tariff Rate Is Soaring Under Trump
item.description: The president has earned a reputation for bluffing on tariffs. But he has steadily and dramatically raised U.S. tariffs, transforming global trade.

item.title: Flood risk is widespread in the U.S. Few people have insurance for it

item.title: Shackled for weeks: Federal report finds abuse of restraints in prisons

item.title: Plan to Indefinitely Displace Palestinians Threatens to Derail Gaza Truce
item.description: An Israeli proposal to force much of Gaza’s population into a small enclave is now overshadowing negotiations over a truce.
